PuzzleApproach_VB.synopsis: The player flipped a hidden switch within the ruined temple that revealed a puzzle in the floor. The puzzle consists of a quartet of discs that are turned to align new moons and full moons into different positions as part of a Selunite seal.

PAD_SolvedPuzzle.synopsis: The player has just solved a puzzle in the destroyed Selunite temple, opening a passage to the Underdark.

PuzzleApproach_ReadInstructions_VB.synopsis: The player flipped a hidden switch within the ruined temple that revealed a puzzle in the floor. It matches the design mentioned in a Selunite priestess' lorebook found nearby.

PuzzleApproach_VB_0.speaker: Player
PuzzleApproach_VB_0.text: Stars and the full moon... is this what that dwarf's poem was talking about?

PuzzleApproach_VB_1.speaker: Player
PuzzleApproach_VB_1.text: Stars and moons like that dwarf's poem said. And these plates can be turned.

PuzzleApproach_VB_2.speaker: Player
PuzzleApproach_VB_2.text: What kind of contraption is this?

PuzzleApproach_VB_3.speaker: Player
PuzzleApproach_VB_3.text: Looks like all those moon plates can be turned.

PAD_SolvedPuzzle_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SolvedPuzzle_0.text: Huh. This goes very far down. We'll have to go in to see the bottom.

PuzzleApproach_ReadInstructions_VB_1.speaker: Player
PuzzleApproach_ReadInstructions_VB_1.text: Interlocking circles with moons and stars. This must be the seal mentioned in that journal.

PuzzleApproach_ReadInstructions_VB_0.speaker: Player
PuzzleApproach_ReadInstructions_VB_0.text: I bet we can work out how to open it.
